text:
Word Problem   Finding when the distance and the price is equal - cool math

Sunshine truck rental rents a truck\nat a daily rate of [imath] \$ 57.99 [/imath] plus [imath] \$ 0.48 [/imath] per mile. City rentals rents the same\nsize truck at [imath] \$ 58.95 [/imath] plus [imath] \$ 0.46 [/imath] per\n" mile. For what mileage is the cost the same?
